member.name: T:Task1.Population
member.summary: Population class which contains method to calculate how many years does the town need to see its population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.

member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate how many years does the town need to see its population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.
member.param: percentage increase in inhabitants per year.
visitors which will come to live in the town every year.
member.exception: When currentPopulation, initialPopulation or visitors less or equals to zero.
When value of percents less then 0% or more then 100%.
member.returns: Count of years that the town need to see its population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.
